spirit:parameter.spirit:name: ClockDivider_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Divider between AXI- and SPI-clock (must be a multiple of 2)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: TransWidth_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Number of bits per SPI transaction

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: CsHighCycles_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Minimum number of clock-cycles Cs_n high between transactions

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: LsbFirst_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Transmit LSB first (default is MSB first)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: FifoDepth_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Depth of RX and TX FIFO

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: MosiIdleState_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: MOSI signal level in Idle State

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: ReadBitPol_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Polarity of Read operation in RW Mosi bit

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: TriStatePol_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Polarity of tristate signal in case of a 3-Wires SPI

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: SpiDataPos_g
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: SPI data starting position in data word (necessary for 3-Wires SPI)
